name: RepoHead
0:
”Alexa, ask repo head to create public repo hello world.”
”Alexa, ask repo head to list my repos.”
”Alexa, ask repo head tell me my open issues.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: repo head
des:
This skill is meant to add voice capabilities to performing tasks in your Git™ repository hosting service. 
There is no need to go to the site for things such as seeing the latest commit or creating a repo.

You can do things such as:
 1. Create your repositories
 2. List your repositories
 3. Check latest commit for a repository 
 4. Check if you have any open issues assigned to you
 
To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your GitHub, Inc. account with Repo Head.

This is still a work in progress and more features will continue to be added as I better understand what would make it more useful.

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Git Project.
This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by GitHub, Inc.
